purpose: To offer educational resources and code examples to support learning in applied AI topics.
principle: Showcases practical implementations of AI concepts taught in the 100x Applied AI cohort using Python.
reusability: The repository contains modular code examples that can be reused for educational purposes and as a basis for further AI experiments.
limitations: Primarily educational; examples may not be production-ready and are intended for learning purposes.
name: 100x-LLM
description: Code snippets and examples from the 100x Applied AI cohort lectures.
highlight: Provides code snippets and examples from the 100x Applied AI cohort lectures, focusing on practical AI applications.
